mapper.insert:
select SEQ_RZRQ_WARRANT_RATIO.nextval as sysId from DUAL
insert into RZRQ_WARRANT_RATIO( ID, CLOSE_LINE, CORDON, EXTRACT_LINE, MIN_LINE, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, STATE, AUDIT_ID ) values( #{id}, #{closeLine}, #{cordon}, #{extractLine}, #{minLine}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{createUser}, #{updateUser}, #{state}, #{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}})
mapper.update:
update RZRQ_WARRANT_RATIO
CLOSE_LINE=#{closeLine},
CORDON=#{cordon},
EXTRACT_LINE=#{extractLine},
MIN_LINE=#{minLine},
UPDATE_DATE=#{updateDate},
UPDATE_USER=#{updateUser},
STATE=#{state},
AUDIT_ID=#{auditId},
where ID = #{id}
